name: VSOSS
short_description: VSOSS stands for Very Simple Open Source Software - Crowdsourced, Open Source IT Automation not only for IT people. We spend time and money on doing simple IT tasks like software installation, backup, upgrade, migration, etc. We build those installation processes that many other people have build in the past instead of reusing what was done, improve and share to create best practices. More, what’s been delivered is not always exactly what business expected because people who deliver don’t own business processes. Idea is simple, let managers define how IT should support their business by defining required automation processes with simple tasks that can be translated into executables by IT. Those can be shared with others, re-used and improved in order to build the best solutions using best practices. Join VSOSS community at http://www.in-cubator.org/groups/vsoss/ ￼ .
summary: Crowdsourced IT Automation not only for IT people
